	I will encrypt whatever you give me: a
	Here you go: 
	I will encrypt whatever you give me: b
	Here you go: 
	I will encrypt whatever you give me: c
	Here you go: 
	I will encrypt whatever you give me: ab
	Here you go: 
	I will encrypt whatever you give me: abc
	Here you go: 


`a` is present in `ab` but `b` is not present in `ab` which there is some other representation of `b` that is present in `ab`

`a` is also present in `abc` but `b` and `c` are not

BUT the representation of `b` present in `ab` is also present in `abc`

`p` is present in the `flag` 
The `i` obtained from `pi` after removing `p` is present in the flag 
The `c` obtained from `pic` after removing `p` and `i` is present in the flag
